short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds popovers with the detailed information to EDAM terms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects EDAM ontology terms IDs in a webpage and trigger popovers with relevant information for the term like label, description, summary and links to the term in different ontology browsers.
